interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Facial Skincare,Cucumber Essence Hydrating Moisturizing Revitalizing Hydration Fruit Extract Deep Cleaning Facial Skincare Sheet for All Skin Type Care, 35ml/1.18oz, Pack of 5 Review Date: 2020/10/30 Store: PalNour Average Rating: 4.3 Product Details: {} Review Text: Cucumbers are supposed to be amazing for the skin. So, I wanted to give these a go.

Pro: - moisten. Very moist.
- mask doesn't rip or tear
- plastic backing for easier application
- gentle, pleasant aroma
- sinks quickly into skin after massaging at end

Cons: - thin
- hard to slide into place...and then doesn't fit quite right
- suggested wear time is 20-25 mins....longer than usual

These masks come individually packaged in robust and easy to open pouches. The mask has a sturdy, plastic backing, which is the only reason it can be unfolded and placed on without any trouble because these are thin. Surprisingly, they don't rip or tear easily, though. After taking off the backing, it takes a little maneuvering to get these to sit in place. Firstly, the thin material wanted to bunch and roll along the edges of the face, and the lack of thickness made it difficult to get to lay flat. Also, the eye holes aren't quite right. I, my son, and my daughter tried them (each with very different face sizes) and all of us had trouble with the eyes. When they were in position, The bridge of the nose wouldn't stay pressed against the skin, but kept lifting up. The suggested wear time is 20 to 25 minutes, which is longer than the 15 to 20 I normally see on masks. Removing the mask, however, is no problem, and there's a good amount of moisture left over to massage into the skin....which also works well

The masks are moistening and have a gentle, pleasant odor (although I can't really place it). These are refreshing and leave the skin shiny. If only they'd sit better, I'd enjoy them more. Review Title: Moistens Rating: 3.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Bouquet Garni Body Shower White Musk - Unique Fragrance Decanting Engineering Method gives Long Lasting Rich Fragrance - Gentle and Mild Cleansing Scented Body Wash with Natural Surfactant 17.85 Fl Oz Bouquet Garni {'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Skin Type': 'All, Dry', 'Brand': 'Bouquet Garni', 'Scent': 'Garni', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '8.23 x 6.34 x 3.66 inches; 1.34 Pounds'} I picked this one up because a little pampering in the shower doesn't hurt.

Pros: - pump top easy to use and proportion
- lovely design
- doesn't tip over when reaching for it
- nice smell

Cons: - doesn't sud up quite as much as I like

With a larger family comes less 'pamper' time...and this one might not be much, but a little extra, lovely odor is a bonus in my life. This one sits well on the edge of the tub/shower and doesn't tip over every time I reach for it. The pump top works well and makes it easy to get soap without fiddling. It smells nice without being overwhelming and doesn't hang forever on the skin. The soap itself doesn't sud up as much as I'd like (can there be enough bubbles?), but it's not bad, either. The spreads easily, doesn't leave any residue or films, doesn't irritate the skin, and washes off without troubles. So, I'm satisfied. Cleans and lovely odor Facial Skincare,Cucumber Essence Hydrating Moisturizing Revitalizing Hydration Fruit Extract Deep Cleaning Facial Skincare Sheet for All Skin Type Care, 35ml/1.18oz, Pack of 5 PalNour {} Cucumbers are supposed to be amazing for the skin. Removing the mask, however, is no problem, and there's a good amount of moisture left over to massage into the skin....which also works well

The masks are moistening and have a gentle, pleasant odor (although I can't really place it). These are refreshing and leave the skin shiny. If only they'd sit better, I'd enjoy them more. Moistens
profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Scent Preference:** Prefers gentle and pleasant fragrances that provide a touch of pampering without being overwhelming.
- **Product Form:** Favors gel formulations and sheet masks, particularly those that are easy to handle and dispense.
- **Functionality:** Values practical features such as stability during use, ease of application, and effective cleansing without irritation; appreciates innovative designs, like sturdy backings for easier application of masks.
- **Skin Sensitivity:** Prioritizes products suitable for all skin types, especially those that cater to dry skin, with a focus on moisturizing and revitalizing effects.
- **Experience Focus:** Enjoys the experience of using personal care products, expressing a desire for moments of indulgence, even in a busy family setting.
- **Performance Expectations:** Appreciates products that provide a satisfying clean with an emphasis on hydration, though may have mixed experiences with fit and usability depending on product design, indicating a balance between practicality and luxury.
- **Brand Awareness:** Shows interest in natural material features and hydration properties, suggesting a preference for environmentally friendly and nourishing products.
- **Rating Behavior:** Tends to provide thoughtful reviews, weighing both pros and cons, with a tendency to rate higher when products meet her functional and sensory needs, although recent experience with fit and design led to a more critical rating.

Overall, the user seeks effective, pleasant-smelling products that enhance her limited pampering moments while being compatible with a family lifestyle.
